name: ZControl
0:
”Alexa tell zee control to test my pump”
”Alexa ask zee control to check my battery”
”Alexa ask zee control how often my pump is cycling”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zee control
des:
Protect your property with Z Control connected products. Z Control is for more than just receiving alert notifications. With the Z Control skill, you can remotely test equipment, silence alarms, manage preferences, and adjust settings.

Compatible with the following Z Control Enabled devices:
Zoeller Aquanot Fit 508 DC sump pump system
Zoeller APak Indoor high water alarm
Zoeller Z Control Wi-Fi Gateway

Flint and Walling Commander Pro VFD system

Basement Sentry Plus DC sump pump system
Basement Sentry Platinum DC sump pump system
Basement Sentry Intelligent Sump Pump
